pages.title: Modifying Vault Gear
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Void orbs$() may be used to remove a random modifier from any Vault Gear piece, assuming it has any available repair slots.$(br2)By using a $(#033dfc)Void orb$(), there is a $(#ff0000)20%$() chance of it consuming a repair slot.
Void Orbs can be crafted or found inside vaults, they require $(#033dfc)Void Liquid$(), which can be found in the depths of architect vaults or in a Vault Room reminiscent of a Factory.

pages.title: Specifying Modifiers
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Void orbs$() may also be focused towards removing a specific modifier by applying an $(#033dfc)Artisan Scroll$() to them inside an anvil.
